001package squidpony.squidmath;
002
003import static squidpony.squidmath.ValueNoise.valueNoise;
004
005/**
006 * An unusual continuous noise generator that tends to produce organic-looking forms, currently supporting 2D, 3D, 4D
007 * and 6D. Produces noise values from -1.0 inclusive to 1.0 exclusive. Typically needs fewer octaves than the Simplex
008 * option in FastNoise to produce roughly comparable quality, but it also has about a third the speed. A useful property
009 * of FoamNoise is how its visual "character" doesn't change much as dimensions are added; whereas 6D simplex noise
010 * tends to separate into "surflets" separated by spans of 0, and higher dimensions of simplex only have larger such
011 * spans, FoamNoise seems to stay approximately as coherent in 2D, 3D, and 4D. Verifying this claim about FoamNoise is
012 * not easy, but it makes sense intuitively because of how this generator works. Simplex noise in N dimensions relies on
013 * a lattice of N-simplices (such as triangles in 2D or tetrahedra in 3D) and evaluates the noise at a point by hashing
014 * each of the N+1 vertices, looking up a gradient vector for each vertex from a pre-calculated array, and combining the
015 * gradient vectors based on proximity of the evaluated point to each vertex. FoamNoise in N dimensions is not nearly as
016 * complex; it relies on making N+1 averaged calls to N-dimensional value noise, each call using a rotated (and
017 * potentially skewed) set of axes, with each call's result also affecting the inputs to the next call (domain warping).
018 * Value noise uses a cubic lattice or its hypercube equivalent in higher dimensions, which seems to be more "stable" as
019 * dimensionality increases, and the number of value noise calls increases at the same rate as simplex noise adds
020 * gradient vectors. Averaging more calls causes the distribution of the noise to gradually approach Gaussian (biased
021 * toward results in the center of the range), but adjustments this does at the end counteract this well enough. 
022 * <br>
023 * It's encouraged to experiment with the lacunarity parameter in {@link Noise.Layered3D} and similar classes if you use
024 * one of those variants, which also probably needs adjustments to frequency. Changing lacunarity wit multiple octaves
025 * can be useful to edit how tightly the noise clumps together. FoamNoise tends to look about the same with 3 octaves as
026 * it does with 4 octaves; for perceived quality, the returns seem to diminish quickly from added octaves. This isn't
027 * accurate for all frequencies, so you should definitely run through your options for what kinds of noise look good for
028 * a particular scenario. Mixing Simplex and Foam noise can produce a good water effect when applied to grid cells.
029 * <br>
030 * <a href="https://i.imgur.com/WpUz1xP.png">2D FoamNoise, one octave</a>,
031 * <a href="https://i.imgur.com/CDXcQRW.png">2D FoamNoise, one octave colorized</a>,
032 * <a href="https://i.imgur.com/XYUN8y4.png">2D FoamNoise, two octaves colorized</a> (note fewer peaks and valleys),
033 * <a href="https://i.imgur.com/cSiXzgW.gifv">3D FoamNoise animated over time, one octave colorized</a>,
034 * <a href="https://i.imgur.com/a2xO1Tb.gifv">3D FoamNoise animated over time, two octaves colorized</a>,
035 * <a href="https://i.imgur.com/MMnPn8C.gifv">4D FoamNoise animated over time, one octave colorized</a>,
036 * <a href="https://i.imgur.com/0ZHicDs.gifv">4D FoamNoise animated over time, two octaves colorized</a>,
037 * <a href="https://i.imgur.com/pjuFork.gifv">6D FoamNoise animated over time, one octave colorized</a>,
038 * <a href="https://i.imgur.com/CvWFFyI.gifv">6D FoamNoise animated over time, two octaves colorized</a>,
039 * <a href="https://i.imgur.com/ktCTiIK.jpg">World map made using FoamNoise</a>.
040 */
041public class FoamNoise implements Noise.Noise2D, Noise.Noise3D, Noise.Noise4D, Noise.Noise5D, Noise.Noise6D {
042    public static final FoamNoise instance = new FoamNoise();
043    
044    public int seed = 0xD1CEBEEF;
045    public double sharpness = 0.75;
046    public FoamNoise() {
047    }
048
049    public FoamNoise(int seed) {
050        this.seed = seed;
051    }
052
053    public FoamNoise(long seed) {
054        this.seed = (int) (seed ^ seed >>> 32);
055    }
056
057    public FoamNoise(long seed, double sharpness) {
058        this(seed);
059        this.sharpness = 0.75 * sharpness;
060        
061    }
062
063    public double foamNoise(final double x, final double y, int seed) {
064        final double p0 = x;
065        final double p1 = x * -0.5 + y * 0.8660254037844386;
066        final double p2 = x * -0.5 + y * -0.8660254037844387;
067
068        double xin = p1;
069        double yin = p2;
070        //double xin = x * 0.540302 + y * 0.841471; // sin and cos of 1
071        //double yin = x * -0.841471 + y * 0.540302;
072        final double a = valueNoise(seed, xin, yin);
073        seed += 0x9E3779BD;
074        seed = (seed ^ seed >>> 12) * 0xDAB;
075        seed ^= seed >>> 14;
076        xin = p2;
077        yin = p0;
078        //xin = x * -0.989992 + y * 0.141120; // sin and cos of 3
079        //yin = x * -0.141120 + y * -0.989992;
080        final double b = valueNoise(seed, xin + a, yin);
081        seed += 0x9E3779BD;
082        seed = (seed ^ seed >>> 12) * 0xDAB;
083        seed ^= seed >>> 14;
084        xin = p0;
085        yin = p1;
086        //xin = x * 0.283662 + y * -0.958924; // sin and cos of 5
087        //yin = x * 0.958924 + y * 0.283662;
088        final double c = valueNoise(seed, xin + b, yin);
089        final double result = a * 0.3125 + (b + c) * 0.34375;
090//        return result * result * (6.0 - 4.0 * result) - 1.0;
091//        return (result <= 0.5)
092//                ? (result * result * 4.0) - 1.0
093//                : 1.0 - ((result - 1.0) * (result - 1.0) * 4.0);
094        final double sharp = sharpness * 2.2;
095        final double diff = 0.5 - result;
096        final int sign = NumberTools.doubleToHighIntBits(diff) >> 31, one = sign | 1;
097        return ((( 0.5 * one - sign) * (result + sign)) / (Double.MIN_VALUE - sign + (result + sharp * diff) * one) - sign) * 2.0 - 1.0;
098    }
099    
100    /*
101x * -0.185127 + y * -0.791704 + z * -0.582180;
102x * -0.776796 + y * 0.628752 + z * -0.035464;
103x * 0.822283 + y * 0.467437 + z * -0.324582;
104
105x * 0.139640 + y * -0.304485 + z * 0.942226;
106x * -0.776796 + y * 0.628752 + z * -0.035464;
107x * 0.822283 + y * 0.467437 + z * -0.324582;
108
109x * 0.139640 + y * -0.304485 + z * 0.942226;
110x * -0.185127 + y * -0.791704 + z * -0.582180;
111x * 0.822283 + y * 0.467437 + z * -0.324582;
112
113x * 0.139640 + y * -0.304485 + z * 0.942226;
114x * -0.185127 + y * -0.791704 + z * -0.582180;
115x * -0.776796 + y * 0.628752 + z * -0.035464;
116     */
117
118
119    public double foamNoise(final double x, final double y, final double z, int seed) {
120        final double p0 = x;
121        final double p1 = x * -0.3333333333333333 + y * 0.9428090415820634;
122        final double p2 = x * -0.3333333333333333 + y * -0.4714045207910317 + z * 0.816496580927726;
123        final double p3 = x * -0.3333333333333333 + y * -0.4714045207910317 + z * -0.816496580927726;
124
125        //final double p0 = (x + y + z);// * 0.5;
126        //final double p1 = x - (y + z);// * 0.25;
127        //final double p2 = y - (x + z);// * 0.25;
128        //final double p3 = z - (x + y);// * 0.25;
129////rotated version of above points on a tetrahedron; the ones below are "more correct" but more complex (and slower?)       
130//        final double p0 = x * 0.139640 + y * -0.304485 + z * 0.942226;
131//        final double p1 = x * -0.185127 + y * -0.791704 + z * -0.582180;
132//        final double p2 = x * -0.776796 + y * 0.628752 + z * -0.035464;
133//        final double p3 = x * 0.822283 + y * 0.467437 + z * -0.324582;
134        double xin = p1;
135        double yin = p2;
136        double zin = p3;
137        final double a = valueNoise(seed, xin, yin, zin);
138        //seed = (seed ^ 0x9E3779BD) * 0xDAB;
139        seed += 0x9E3779BD;
140        seed = (seed ^ seed >>> 12) * 0xDAB;
141        seed ^= seed >>> 14;
142        xin = p0;
143        yin = p2;
144        zin = p3;
145        final double b = valueNoise(seed, xin + a, yin, zin);
146        //seed = (seed ^ 0x9E3779BD) * 0xDAB;
147        seed += 0x9E3779BD;
148        seed = (seed ^ seed >>> 12) * 0xDAB;
149        seed ^= seed >>> 14;
150        xin = p0;
151        yin = p1;
152        zin = p3;
153        final double c = valueNoise(seed, xin + b, yin, zin);
154        //seed = (seed ^ 0x9E3779BD) * 0xDAB;
155        seed += 0x9E3779BD;
156        seed = (seed ^ seed >>> 12) * 0xDAB;
157        seed ^= seed >>> 14;
158        xin = p0;
159        yin = p1;
160        zin = p2;
161        final double d = valueNoise(seed, xin + c, yin, zin);
162
163        final double result = (a + b + c + d) * 0.25;
164//        return  (result * result * (6.0 - 4.0 * result) - 1.0);
165//        return (result <= 0.5)
166//                ? Math.pow(result * 2, 3.0) - 1.0
167//                : Math.pow((result - 1) * 2, 3.0) + 1.0;
168        final double sharp = sharpness * 3.3;
169        final double diff = 0.5 - result;
170        final int sign = NumberTools.doubleToHighIntBits(diff) >> 31, one = sign | 1;
171        return ((( 0.5 * one - sign) * (result + sign)) / (Double.MIN_VALUE - sign + (result + sharp * diff) * one) - sign) * 2.0 - 1.0;
172
173    }
174
175    public double foamNoise(final double x, final double y, final double z, final double w, int seed) {
176        final double p0 = x;
177        final double p1 = x * -0.25 + y * 0.9682458365518543;
178        final double p2 = x * -0.25 + y * -0.3227486121839514 + z * 0.9128709291752769;
179        final double p3 = x * -0.25 + y * -0.3227486121839514 + z * -0.45643546458763834 + w * 0.7905694150420949;
180        final double p4 = x * -0.25 + y * -0.3227486121839514 + z * -0.45643546458763834 + w * -0.7905694150420947;
181////orthogonal 5-cell, like a right triangle; probably incorrect
182        //final double p0 = (x + y + z + w);
183        //final double p1 = x - (y + z + w);
184        //final double p2 = y - (x + z + w);
185        //final double p3 = z - (x + y + w);
186        //final double p4 = w - (x + y + z);
187////rotated version of above points on a 5-cell; the ones below are "more correct" but more complex (and slower?)       
188//        final double p0 = x * 0.139640 + y * -0.304485 + z * 0.942226;
189//        final double p1 = x * -0.185127 + y * -0.791704 + z * -0.582180;
190//        final double p2 = x * -0.776796 + y * 0.628752 + z * -0.035464;
191//        final double p3 = x * 0.822283 + y * 0.467437 + z * -0.324582;
192        double xin = p1;
193        double yin = p2;
194        double zin = p3;
195        double win = p4;
196        final double a = valueNoise(seed, xin, yin, zin, win);
197        //seed = (seed ^ 0x9E3779BD) * 0xDAB;
198        seed += 0x9E3779BD;
199        seed = (seed ^ seed >>> 12) * 0xDAB;
200        seed ^= seed >>> 14;
201        xin = p0;
202        yin = p2;
203        zin = p3;
204        win = p4;
205        final double b = valueNoise(seed, xin + a, yin, zin, win);
206        //seed = (seed ^ 0x9E3779BD) * 0xDAB;
207        seed += 0x9E3779BD;
208        seed = (seed ^ seed >>> 12) * 0xDAB;
209        seed ^= seed >>> 14;
210        xin = p0;
211        yin = p1;
212        zin = p3;
213        win = p4;
214        final double c = valueNoise(seed, xin + b, yin, zin, win);
215        //seed = (seed ^ 0x9E3779BD) * 0xDAB;
216        seed += 0x9E3779BD;
217        seed = (seed ^ seed >>> 12) * 0xDAB;
218        seed ^= seed >>> 14;
219        xin = p0;
220        yin = p1;
221        zin = p2;
222        win = p4;
223        final double d = valueNoise(seed, xin + c, yin, zin, win);
224        seed += 0x9E3779BD;
225        seed = (seed ^ seed >>> 12) * 0xDAB;
226        seed ^= seed >>> 14;
227        xin = p0;
228        yin = p1;
229        zin = p2;
230        win = p3;
231        final double e = valueNoise(seed, xin + d, yin, zin, win);
232
233        final double result = (a + b + c + d + e) * 0.2;
234//        return (result <= 0.5)
235//                ? Math.pow(result * 2, 4.0) - 1.0
236//                : 1.0 - Math.pow((result - 1) * 2, 4.0);
237//        return  (result * result * (6.0 - 4.0 * result) - 1.0);
238        final double sharp = sharpness * 4.4;
239        final double diff = 0.5 - result;
240        final int sign = NumberTools.doubleToHighIntBits(diff) >> 31, one = sign | 1;
241        return ((( 0.5 * one - sign) * (result + sign)) / (Double.MIN_VALUE - sign + (result + sharp * diff) * one) - sign) * 2.0 - 1.0;
242    }
243    public double foamNoise(final double x, final double y, final double z,
244                                   final double w, final double u, int seed) {
245        final double p0 = x * 0.8157559148337911 + y * 0.5797766823136037;
246        final double p1 = x * -0.7314923478726791 + y * 0.6832997137249108;
247        final double p2 = x * -0.0208603044412437 + y * -0.3155296974329846 + z * 0.9486832980505138;
248        final double p3 = x * -0.0208603044412437 + y * -0.3155296974329846 + z * -0.316227766016838 + w * 0.8944271909999159;
249        final double p4 = x * -0.0208603044412437 + y * -0.3155296974329846 + z * -0.316227766016838 + w * -0.44721359549995804 + u * 0.7745966692414833;
250        final double p5 = x * -0.0208603044412437 + y * -0.3155296974329846 + z * -0.316227766016838 + w * -0.44721359549995804 + u * -0.7745966692414836;
251
252        double xin = p1;
253        double yin = p2;
254        double zin = p3;
255        double win = p4;
256        double uin = p5;
257        final double a = valueNoise(seed, xin, yin, zin, win, uin);
258        seed += 0x9E3779BD;
259        seed = (seed ^ seed >>> 12) * 0xDAB;
260        seed ^= seed >>> 14;
261        xin = p0;
262        yin = p2;
263        zin = p3;
264        win = p4;
265        uin = p5;
266        final double b = valueNoise(seed, xin + a, yin, zin, win, uin);
267        seed += 0x9E3779BD;
268        seed = (seed ^ seed >>> 12) * 0xDAB;
269        seed ^= seed >>> 14;
270        xin = p0;
271        yin = p1;
272        zin = p3;
273        win = p4;
274        uin = p5;
275        final double c = valueNoise(seed, xin + b, yin, zin, win, uin);
276        seed += 0x9E3779BD;
277        seed = (seed ^ seed >>> 12) * 0xDAB;
278        seed ^= seed >>> 14;
279        xin = p0;
280        yin = p1;
281        zin = p2;
282        win = p4;
283        uin = p5;
284        final double d = valueNoise(seed, xin + c, yin, zin, win, uin);
285        seed += 0x9E3779BD;
286        seed = (seed ^ seed >>> 12) * 0xDAB;
287        seed ^= seed >>> 14;
288        xin = p0;
289        yin = p1;
290        zin = p2;
291        win = p3;
292        uin = p5;
293        final double e = valueNoise(seed, xin + d, yin, zin, win, uin);
294        seed += 0x9E3779BD;
295        seed = (seed ^ seed >>> 12) * 0xDAB;
296        seed ^= seed >>> 14;
297        xin = p0;
298        yin = p1;
299        zin = p2;
300        win = p3;
301        uin = p4;
302        final double f = valueNoise(seed, xin + e, yin, zin, win, uin);
303
304        final double result = (a + b + c + d + e + f) * 0.16666666666666666;
305//        return (result <= 0.5)
306//                ? 32.0 * result * result * result * result * result - 1.0
307//                : 32.0 * (result - 1) * (result - 1) * (result - 1) * (result - 1) * (result - 1) + 1.0;
308        final double sharp = sharpness * 5.5;
309        final double diff = 0.5 - result;
310        final int sign = NumberTools.doubleToHighIntBits(diff) >> 31, one = sign | 1;
311        return ((( 0.5 * one - sign) * (result + sign)) / (Double.MIN_VALUE - sign + (result + sharp * diff) * one) - sign) * 2.0 - 1.0;
312    }
313
314    public double foamNoise(final double x, final double y, final double z,
315                                   final double w, final double u, final double v, int seed) {
316        final double p0 = x;
317        final double p1 = x * -0.16666666666666666 + y * 0.9860132971832694;
318        final double p2 = x * -0.16666666666666666 + y * -0.19720265943665383 + z * 0.9660917830792959;
319        final double p3 = x * -0.16666666666666666 + y * -0.19720265943665383 + z * -0.24152294576982394 + w * 0.9354143466934853;
320        final double p4 = x * -0.16666666666666666 + y * -0.19720265943665383 + z * -0.24152294576982394 + w * -0.31180478223116176 + u * 0.8819171036881969;
321        final double p5 = x * -0.16666666666666666 + y * -0.19720265943665383 + z * -0.24152294576982394 + w * -0.31180478223116176 + u * -0.4409585518440984 + v * 0.7637626158259734;
322        final double p6 = x * -0.16666666666666666 + y * -0.19720265943665383 + z * -0.24152294576982394 + w * -0.31180478223116176 + u * -0.4409585518440984 + v * -0.7637626158259732;
323        double xin = p1;
324        double yin = p2;
325        double zin = p3;
326        double win = p4;
327        double uin = p5;
328        double vin = p6;
329        final double a = valueNoise(seed, xin, yin, zin, win, uin, vin);
330        seed += 0x9E3779BD;
331        seed = (seed ^ seed >>> 12) * 0xDAB;
332        seed ^= seed >>> 14;
333        xin = p0;
334        yin = p2;
335        zin = p3;
336        win = p4;
337        uin = p5;
338        vin = p6;
339        final double b = valueNoise(seed, xin + a, yin, zin, win, uin, vin);
340        seed += 0x9E3779BD;
341        seed = (seed ^ seed >>> 12) * 0xDAB;
342        seed ^= seed >>> 14;
343        xin = p0;
344        yin = p1;
345        zin = p3;
346        win = p4;
347        uin = p5;
348        vin = p6;
349        final double c = valueNoise(seed, xin + b, yin, zin, win, uin, vin);
350        seed += 0x9E3779BD;
351        seed = (seed ^ seed >>> 12) * 0xDAB;
352        seed ^= seed >>> 14;
353        xin = p0;
354        yin = p1;
355        zin = p2;
356        win = p4;
357        uin = p5;
358        vin = p6;
359        final double d = valueNoise(seed, xin + c, yin, zin, win, uin, vin);
360        seed += 0x9E3779BD;
361        seed = (seed ^ seed >>> 12) * 0xDAB;
362        seed ^= seed >>> 14;
363        xin = p0;
364        yin = p1;
365        zin = p2;
366        win = p3;
367        uin = p5;
368        vin = p6;
369        final double e = valueNoise(seed, xin + d, yin, zin, win, uin, vin);
370        seed += 0x9E3779BD;
371        seed = (seed ^ seed >>> 12) * 0xDAB;
372        seed ^= seed >>> 14;
373        xin = p0;
374        yin = p1;
375        zin = p2;
376        win = p3;
377        uin = p4;
378        vin = p6;
379        final double f = valueNoise(seed, xin + e, yin, zin, win, uin, vin);
380        seed += 0x9E3779BD;
381        seed = (seed ^ seed >>> 12) * 0xDAB;
382        seed ^= seed >>> 14;
383        xin = p0;
384        yin = p1;
385        zin = p2;
386        win = p3;
387        uin = p4;
388        vin = p5;
389        final double g = valueNoise(seed, xin + f, yin, zin, win, uin, vin);
390
391        final double result = (a + b + c + d + e + f + g) * 0.14285714285714285;
392//        return (result <= 0.5)
393//                ? Math.pow(result * 2, 6.0) - 1.0
394//                : 1.0 - Math.pow((result - 1) * 2, 6.0);
395        final double sharp = sharpness * 6.6;
396        final double diff = 0.5 - result;
397        final int sign = NumberTools.doubleToHighIntBits(diff) >> 31, one = sign | 1;
398        return ((( 0.5 * one - sign) * (result + sign)) / (Double.MIN_VALUE - sign + (result + sharp * diff) * one) - sign) * 2.0 - 1.0;
399    }
400
401    @Override
402    public double getNoise(double x, double y) {
403        return foamNoise(x, y, seed);
404    }
405    @Override
406    public double getNoiseWithSeed(double x, double y, long seed) {
407        return foamNoise(x, y, (int) (seed ^ seed >>> 32));
408    }
409    @Override
410    public double getNoise(double x, double y, double z) {
411        return foamNoise(x, y, z, seed);
412    }
413    @Override
414    public double getNoiseWithSeed(double x, double y, double z, long seed) {
415        return foamNoise(x, y, z, (int) (seed ^ seed >>> 32));
416    }
417    @Override
418    public double getNoise(double x, double y, double z, double w) {
419        return foamNoise(x, y, z, w, seed);
420    }
421    @Override
422    public double getNoiseWithSeed(double x, double y, double z, double w, long seed) {
423        return foamNoise(x, y, z, w, (int) (seed ^ seed >>> 32));
424    }
425    @Override
426    public double getNoise(double x, double y, double z, double w, double u) {
427        return foamNoise(x, y, z, w, u, seed);
428    }
429    @Override
430    public double getNoiseWithSeed(double x, double y, double z, double w, double u, long seed) {
431        return foamNoise(x, y, z, w, u, (int) (seed ^ seed >>> 32));
432    }
433    @Override
434    public double getNoise(double x, double y, double z, double w, double u, double v) {
435        return foamNoise(x, y, z, w, u, v, seed);
436    }
437    @Override
438    public double getNoiseWithSeed(double x, double y, double z, double w, double u, double v, long seed) {
439        return foamNoise(x, y, z, w, u, v, (int) (seed ^ seed >>> 32));
440    }
441}
